fulltext:
Management Consultant
Phone:
+84(0)901 34 91 86
Address:
50 Le Loi, Minh An, Hoi An, Vietnam
Website: https://www.linkedin.com/in/np5/
Email: nhungpham555@gmail.com
Nhung Pham
• Experienced working with multiple level of management in various industries: team leader, manager, director and board of
director 
• Proper skills: communication; sale; negotiation; management
• Quick self-learner, multitasking handling, adaptability and flexibility 
• Active, motivated, enthusiastic and responsible team member;
EXPERIENCE
Online Business
Owner
Present
Sell accessories online like scarfs and jewelry on Social Network and e-commerce platform like Facebook, Instagram, Shopee
and Lazada
Planning online marketing campaigns to gain traffic and engagement, setting suitable segmentation and running time for each
campaign, following up how effectiveness of each campaign to improve for the next strategies
Obtain certain knowledge about online marketing and e-commerce platform, learning how to run own business online and gain
more experience about e-commerce platform
IMPAC® Integrated Control Systems, Inc.
Management Engineering
October 2016  -  April 2018
Industries: Wood, Furniture and Textile 
1. Analysis : Production, Maintenance and Quality Control departments
Providing the accuracy results showed as charts and tables in Excel form of the production observation about worker activities,
task management, machine usage, time consumption to analyse the productivity and effectiveness of work
2. Management Engineering : Production, Maintenance and Quality Control departments
Drawing the management structures, the production process and the development system by Visio software, Excel and
Powerpoint documents
Consulting team leaders to apply new process to improve management and productivity 
- Applying down time machine tool to calculate loss time and identify reasons to fix the problems and improve machine
maintenance to support production
- Using variance summary to indicate the reasons leading to production loss and propose solutions immediately
- Suggesting QC team using compliance checklist to ensure the quality of products matching the quality standard
- Calculating man load based on observation results and standard norm in order to implement labor deduction or increase
labor to get saving or improve productivity depending on the client purposes
- Following up daily and weekly meeting with manager and team leaders to update current situation in the workshop and
solve problems if any
Presenting the results to Board of Director, receiving positive feedbacks from clients
Khaihoanland
Sale Executive
June 2015  -  June 2016 (1 year 1 month)
Marketing and sale real estate properties; focusing on luxury properties
Experienced communication with local and international customers
Improved marketing skills, communication, presentation and negotiation 
Help team member making sale successfully 
Get a certain number of potential customers and open networking
Created using Resumonk - Online Resume Builder
Epinion Ltd Vietnam
Project Management Assistant
October 2012  -  October 2014 (2 years 1
month)
1. October 2012 to June 2013 - Data collection
Took a role as specialist in data collection team, created surveys and followed up status.
Having a better time management skills, data collection skills
2. June 2013 to November 2014 – Project Management Assistant
Took a role as project manager in some major projects such as CPH project and SPSS Migration, made detailed plan, followed up
tasks and contacted with European clients
Good planning and following up skills
Speed up the process and deliver products on time. 
Experience with Zoho and Zendesk system to book task and manage project tickets
EDUCATION
RMIT University Vietnam
Bachelor of Business Information System
2010 - 2014
British Council
Email writing class
10 weeks - 2013
LANGUAGES
English (Professional Working Proficiency), Chinese (Elementary Proficiency)
SKILLS
Project Management, Project Planning, Sale, Consulting, Communication, Email Writing, Market Research, Technical Support, Data
Analyst, Information Technology, Database, Leadership, Teamwork, Training, Multitasking, Online Marketing, Ms Office,
Programing, SQL, Statistics, SPSS, Ms Project, Zoho, Zendesk, Sharepoint
